name: Ext_R5_Timing_re_when
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Timing.repeat.when for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Timing.repeat.when from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Timing|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Code for time period of occurrence
element.definition: An approximate time period during the day, potentially linked to an event of daily living that indicates when the action should occur.
element.comment: `Timing.repeat.when` maps to R4B `Timing.repeat.when`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Code for time period of occurrence
element.definition: An approximate time period during the day, potentially linked to an event of daily living that indicates when the action should occur.
element.comment: `Timing.repeat.when` maps to R4B `Timing.repeat.when`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Real-world event relating to the schedule.
